dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
Wikiplaces is a Android application with 

GPLv3 license hosted at Google Code.

The "Top Gasolineras España" Android app is based on the Wikiplaces source
 
code (recognized by the authors after an email notification) but they  
refuse to release the app as GPLv3 and publish the source code.

This is a a license infringement because the GPLv3 license forces all the 

modified versions of the source code to be released under the same
license.
